Sr Java Developer FT perm position North York
Will be working on a team responsible for designing, configuring and implementing software solutions for enterprise customers in the Financial Services, Insurance, and Healthcare industries.
We are looking for dynamic individuals to play key contributing roles on our project teams. Ideal candidate will bring enthusiasm, willingness to learn, initiative, excellent verbal and written communication skills, and a strong desire to work in a fast-paced and high-growth environment.
Position Description: The successful candidate will have the opportunity to advance their career quickly by working with new technologies, an experienced executive management team, and industry-leading company with a track record of success. This is a unique opportunity that offers leadership potential, design and development experience, and occasional travel. This role requires strong technical, analytical and problem solving skills.
As a Professional Services Consultant, you will be responsible for: • Gathering and analyzing customer business and technical requirements • Working with members of Product Management to define and document functional requirements, workflows, and designs to meet customer requirements • Modeling technical designs using our state-of-the-art model-driven framework • Development and configuration of client-specific solutions • Client data conversion, involving batch or real-time integration with existing systems • Conducting client site implementations , including software installation and configuration • Technical sales support including the implementation of software demonstrations
Preference will be given to candidates with experience in the following areas: • Consulting • Large-scale enterprise software implementation projects • Software implementations for Financial Services organizations, such as Wealth Management, Life Insurance, P&C Insurance, Investment Banking and Retail Banking we value proven problem-solving skills, the ability to learn quickly, persistence, and the ability to manage competing priorities in a challenging atmosphere.
Candidates will be working directly with clients and will be required to travel (mainly within Canada and to the US) and work at the client site.
Skill Set Requirements:
This position requires a highly-focused, technically-adept individual with a thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle, model-driven development methodologies and documentation standards.
The following skills will be assets: • Experience in Java, C++, and/or C# development • Strong understanding of object-oriented design, and programming patterns • Scripting languages (e.g. VBscript, Javascript, Scheme) • Enterprise application architectures and SOA design • SQL generation and optimization as well as schema design experience (preferably with MSSQL, DB2, and/or Oracle) • Data warehousing, data marts, report generation (Crystal, Jasper, Cognos) • Deployment, configuration, and management of J2EE Database systems, Exchange, and Blackberry Applications (preferably using WebSphere and/or JBoss) • Microsoft Office and Adobe data-driven forms and spreadsheets • Knowledge of project management methodologies and tools • Strong oral and written communication skills • Computer Software Engineering or Computer Science degree
